EmailTemplate.description: App Pipeline - Unsub Online App open. Rnd 3
EmailTemplate.name: (Coco) 0.1.2 App Pipeline - Unsub Online App open. Rnd 3
EmailTemplate.subject: Your application - Important next steps | Teach For Australia
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for opening an application for the Leadership Development Program (LDP), Cohort 2025. I’m Coco, and I’ll be supporting you through the Teach For Australia (TFA) Selection Process.
Before moving forward with the selection process, I encourage you to:
1. Check that you meet the Program Requirements, including:
Placement – You must be willing to accept a placement in these jurisdictions: VIC, WA, SA, NT, or TAS. Start date – you must be able to start the full-time program in mid-November 2024. Eligibility – check that you meet the learning area requirements, and are eligible for this program.
2. Book a call with a Recruiter
During this call, we'll get to know more about you and your motivations for joining the program, as well as discuss any questions you may have about the TFA, and the selection process. Book a call
3. Attend our Application Workshop
Learn more about the competencies and how to write a successful application, by attending our upcoming Application Workshop.
If you have any questions or concerns, please email me. I'll be in touch with some further tips. Visit this link to continue working on your written application.
IMPORTANT: This is the final round to apply for Cohort 2025. We encourage you to submit your application within five days of opening it.
---
Upcoming Events
TFA Events
Speak soon,
Coco Carter (she, her, hers)
Recruitment Manager
Graduates & Early Career Professionals, VIC, NT, ACT, OS
On Wadawurrung Country
Teach For Australia 33 Lincoln Square South, Carlton VIC 3053 Phone w. +61 3 8640 4500 |
